/* AlimtalkSendHistMapper.getAlimtalkSendHistList */
SELECT hssrt.REG_DT, hssrt.ALK_SEND_ORGN_CD, (SELECT ORGN_NM FROM TB_WB_USER_INFO_DTL_V01 WHERE ORGN_CD = hssrt.ALK_SEND_ORGN_CD GROUP BY ORGN_NM) AS ALK_SEND_ORGN_NM, hssrt.ALK_SEND_SEQ, hssrt.ALK_SEND_COUNT, hssrt.MSG_TYPE, hssrt.SUBJECT, hssrt.MSG_CONTENT, DECODE(hssrt.RESERVE_YN, '1', hssrt.SEND_DATE, NULL) AS SEND_DATE, hssrt.READ_DATE, hssrt.RESERVE_YN, hssrt.SEND_QTY, hssrt.WAIT_QTY, hssrt.SUCCESS_QTY, hssrt.FAIL_QTY
FROM HCS_ALK_SEND_REG_T hssrt, ( SELECT twuidv01.ORGN_FG, twuidv01.ORGN_CD, twuidv01.ORGN_NM, twuidv01.HQ_OFFICE_CD, twuidv01.STORE_CD, (CASE WHEN twuidv01.ORGN_FG = 'H' THEN (SELECT AGENCY_CD FROM TB_HQ_OFFICE WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = twuidv01.HQ_OFFICE_CD) WHEN twuidv01.ORGN_FG = 'S' THEN (SELECT AGENCY_CD FROM TB_MS_STORE WHERE STORE_CD = twuidv01.STORE_CD) ELSE twuidv01.ORGN_CD END ) AS AGENCY_CD FROM ( SELECT DECODE(twuidv01.ORGN_FG, 'A', 'M', twuidv01.ORGN_FG) AS ORGN_FG, twuidv01.ORGN_CD, twuidv01.ORGN_NM, twuidv01.HQ_OFFICE_CD, twuidv01.STORE_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_INFO_DTL_V01 twuidv01 GROUP BY twuidv01.ORGN_FG, twuidv01.ORGN_CD, twuidv01.ORGN_NM, twuidv01.HQ_OFFICE_CD, twuidv01.STORE_CD ) twuidv01 WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY twuidv01.ORGN_FG, twuidv01.ORGN_CD, twuidv01.ORGN_NM, twuidv01.HQ_OFFICE_CD, twuidv01.STORE_CD ) twuidv01 WHERE 1=1 AND hssrt.REG_DT BETWEEN #{startDate}||'000000' AND #{endDate}||'235959'
AND twuidv01.AGENCY_CD IN (SELECT AGENCY_CD FROM TB_CM_AGENCY WHERE AGENCY_CD = #{orgnCd} OR P_AGENCY_CD = #{orgnCd})
AND twuidv01.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{orgnCd}
AND hssrt.SUBJECT LIKE '%'||#{subject}||'%'
AND hssrt.MSG_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{msgContent}||'%'
AND twuidv01.ORGN_FG IN ('H')
AND twuidv01.ORGN_FG IN ('S')
AND twuidv01.STORE_CD IN (${storeCdQuery})
AND twuidv01.STORE_CD = #{orgnCd}
AND twuidv01.ORGN_CD = hssrt.ALK_SEND_ORGN_CD ORDER BY hssrt.REG_DT DESC

/* AlimtalkSendHistMapper.getAlimtalkAddresseeDtlList */ SELECT A.PHONE_NUMBER, B.ADDR, B.SALE_DATE FROM --알림톡 전송 팝업 ( SELECT * FROM ( ( --알림톡 SELECT SBPENC.D(A.TEL_NO) AS PHONE_NUMBER FROM TB_AL_ALIMTALK_SEND_ENC A WHERE 1=1 AND A.ALK_SEND_SEQ = #{alkSendSeq} ) UNION ALL ( --알림톡 문자 전송결과 SELECT SBPENC.D(A.TEL_NO) AS PHONE_NUMBER FROM TB_AL_ALIMTALK_REPORT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.ALK_SEND_SEQ = #{alkSendSeq} ) ) ) A, --마케팅용 알림톡전송 ( SELECT SBPENC.D(sssemr.TEL_NO) AS PHONE_NUMBER, (sssemr.ADDR || ' ' || sssemr.ADDR_DTL) AS ADDR, sssemr.SALE_DATE FROM TB_AL_ALIMTALK_SEND_ENC_MEMBER_READY sssemr WHERE 1=1 AND sssemr.ALK_SEND_SEQ = #{alkSendSeq} ) B WHERE 1=1 AND B.PHONE_NUMBER (+)= A.PHONE_NUMBER
